definitions.definition: The state or quality of being overextended ; extension beyond normal, correct, or appropriate bounds or limits .
Application of a term to too many referents , as for example when a child uses cat to refer to all animals.

main_definition: The state or quality of being overextended ; extension beyond normal, correct, or appropriate bounds or limits .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) Application of a term to too many referents , as for example when a child uses cat to refer to all animals.
